title: 2017/04/06: Dr Jordan B Peterson Chats with Some Black Guy
description:
I had a good conversation with Derrick Pilot, better known as Some Black Guy (http://bit.ly/2eZ9xqb). We first talked about protests, YouTube pundits and political correctness. Then we talked about vision and responsibility. I mentioned the work my lab has done with Future Authoring (www.selfauthoring.com; story at NPR: http://n.pr/1TpZIxd) and offered his viewers a discount on the program (see below). 

We closed by discussing fantasy play, pretence and identity,  demonetization and other passive censorship on YouTube, and the upper lifetime limit on pizza consumption.  

Discount code for Future Authoring (selfauthoring.com) is posted in the video description of our talk at SomeBlackGuy's YouTube Channel: http://bit.ly/2o7ZJyb
